pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E/Fragrance Free Lotion 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Fragrance Free Body Lotion is a rich, luxurious, daily body lotion which provides deep hydration all over. This velvety soft formula absorbs quickly, creating a protective barrier that locks in moisture. Fragrance Free, meaning it is ideal for sensitive skin!

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

From normal to dry to eczema prone skin, this hypoallergenic lotion effectively softens and relieves skin, leaving it smooth and supple. Made with pure Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E, it provides 24 hour moisture, and smoothes marks and scars. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Theobroma Cacao Extract, Elaeis Guineensis Oil, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Ormenis Multicaulis Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PEG-8 Stearate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Butylene Glycol, Cellulose, Sodium Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyglycerin, Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, CI 19140, CI 15510.

Directions

For a soft, youthful appearance, apply daily, as often as you like, all over body.
